s: November 26, 2024 - Mae is a private label apparel brand that sells women's lingerie, sleepwear, bras and underwear. Goodthreads is a menswear apparel line available to Amazon Prime members. The line offers both casual and professional pieces and is said to act as an alternative to more expensive competitors like J. Crew, Banana Republic, GANT and Brooks Brothers. ... Amazon Essentials is a clothing line of basic wear for men, women, baby, and kids, with additional options for family...

4 days ago - Amazon Essentials (clothing), Amazon Basics (household items), Amazon Kids, Amazon for Business, Amazon Autos (yes, they sell cars), and more. In the past each of these brands operated independently, diluting the overall Amazon experience and making it confusing for shoppers to shop.

t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family allows you to easily manage all your shared services, subscriptions, and digital content from one place. You can manage profiles or linked accounts to share benefits and control access to services and content for kids and teens. Amazon Family allows you to share Amazon benefits ...

t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can create an Amazon Family to share Prime benefits and a Family Library with another adult, up to four teens (who were added before April 7, 2025), and up to four children.

t: Amazon owns more than 80 private-label brands — see the list
